channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

item.title: New Yorkers Wake Up to Snow, Though Not as Much as Forecast
item.description: Predictions were revised down on Friday. Central Park still saw more than 2 inches of snow, with higher totals outside of New York City.
